definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
tropic/one of the two latitude lines, Tropic of Capricorn or Tropic of Cancer
equator (of the earth or astronomical body)
aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]/higher apsis
perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis

pinyin: guo2 ji4 ri4 qi1 bian4 geng1 xian4

definition: geographic latitude (i.e. angle between the equatorial plane and the normal to the reference ellipsoid)
